sectionText: This is a second 8-week course, which meets March 28, 2017 - April 25, 2017 in addition to a mandatory 6-8 weeks experience abroad in a grassroots organization during the summer months (between May 15 and August 3). The program cost ranges from $1900-$3500 depending on the students? choice of field organization. Costs would include airfare, lodging, on the ground transportation and meals. Please contact Illinois Abroad and Global Exchange for more information.
